Friday.title: Registration & Check-in
Friday.description: Event registration and welcome packet pickup

Friday.title: Opening Keynote
Friday.description: Welcome to Open Sauce 2025 - Setting the stage for an incredible weekend of making, learning, and innovation
Friday.speaker: Event Organizers

Friday.title: Maker Workshop: Electronics Basics
Friday.description: Learn the fundamentals of electronics and circuit building. Hands-on workshop covering resistors, capacitors, LEDs, and basic circuit design principles.
Friday.speaker: Electronics Team

Friday.title: Lunch Break
Friday.description: Networking lunch with fellow makers and innovators. Food trucks and catering available on-site.

Friday.title: 3D Printing Showcase
Friday.description: Latest innovations in 3D printing technology. See cutting-edge printers, materials, and techniques in action.
Friday.speaker: 3D Printing Experts

Friday.title: Open Source Hardware Panel
Friday.description: Panel discussion on the future of open source hardware, featuring industry leaders and community advocates.
Friday.speaker: Industry Leaders

Friday.title: Lightning Talks
Friday.description: Quick 5-minute presentations from community members sharing their latest projects and ideas.

Saturday.title: Coffee & Morning Networking
Saturday.description: Start your day with coffee and connect with fellow attendees before the sessions begin.

Saturday.title: Robotics Workshop
Saturday.description: Build and program your own robot using Arduino and sensors. Learn about motor control, sensor integration, and basic AI concepts.
Saturday.speaker: Robotics Team

Saturday.title: Maker Showcase Presentations
Saturday.description: Makers present their latest projects to the community. See innovative solutions, creative builds, and inspiring stories.

Saturday.title: Lunch & Networking
Saturday.description: Connect with other makers and innovators over lunch. Perfect time to discuss potential collaborations.

Saturday.title: IoT Development Session
Saturday.description: Internet of Things development and best practices. Learn about connectivity, data collection, and cloud integration.
Saturday.speaker: IoT Specialists

Saturday.title: Sustainability in Making
Saturday.description: Eco-friendly approaches to maker projects. Discussion on sustainable materials, energy efficiency, and responsible making.
Saturday.speaker: Sustainability Advocates

Saturday.title: Evening Social
Saturday.description: Casual networking and refreshments. Live music, games, and plenty of opportunities to connect with the community.

Sunday.title: Morning Energizer
Sunday.description: Quick morning session to energize and prepare for the final day of activities.

Sunday.title: AI & Machine Learning Workshop
Sunday.description: Introduction to AI applications in maker projects. Learn about computer vision, machine learning models, and practical implementations.
Sunday.speaker: AI Research Team

Sunday.title: Community Project Collaboration
Sunday.description: Work together on community-driven projects. Join teams working on open source initiatives and collaborative builds.

Sunday.title: Lunch & Final Networking
Sunday.description: Last chance to connect with fellow attendees and exchange contact information for future collaborations.

Sunday.title: Project Demos & Competition
Sunday.description: Final demonstrations of projects built during the event. Community voting for favorite projects.

Sunday.title: Closing Ceremony & Awards
Sunday.description: Recognition of outstanding projects and achievements. Awards ceremony and closing remarks from organizers.
Sunday.speaker: Event Organizers

Sunday.title: Final Showcase & Wrap-up
Sunday.description: Final project demonstrations and event conclusion. Thank you messages and information about future events.
